examples.example: 那些努力奋斗的日子，会成为我们人生中最珍贵的回忆。

translate.english: Those days of hard struggle will become the most precious memories in our lives.

examples.example: 那些充满挑战的经历，让我们变得更加坚强和自信。

translate.english: Those challenging experiences make us become stronger and more confident.

examples.example: 那些美好的梦想，激励着我们不断向前奋进。

translate.english: Those beautiful dreams inspire us to keep forging ahead.
